original_title: 聖少女仮面マルガリータ
overview: A sexy action comedy about the battle between a high school girl  who transforms into a love warrior Margarita when she drinks a holy cocktail. An omnibus c consisting of  three episodes. Watch Margarita fight off perverts, crazed dentists, and and a horned villain / Beelzebub.
title: Holy Girl Mask Margarita
